inclusion.criterion: concomitantly enrolled in the companion Screening and Natural History protocol
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: child-bearing age but on nonhormonal birth control
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: significant comorbidities such as decompensated heart failure or diabetes mellitus, renal or hepatic failure, or decompensated psychiatric conditions
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: The patient has Paget's disease of bone and is starting Bisphosphonate therapy. The sister had the same problems at age 52.
